## Description {#details}

This file moves ARGUMENT instructions after <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag">ScheduleDAG</a> scheduling.

Arguments are really live-in registers, however, since we use virtual registers and LLVM doesn&#39;t support live-in virtual registers, we&#39;re currently making do with ARGUMENT instructions which are placed at the top of the entry block. The trick is to get them to <em>stay</em> at the top of the entry block.

The ARGUMENTS physical register keeps these instructions pinned in place during liveness-aware CodeGen passes, however one thing which does not respect this is the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag">ScheduleDAG</a> scheduler. This pass is therefore run immediately after that.

This is all hopefully a temporary solution until we find a better solution for describing the live-in nature of arguments.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now move any argument instructions later in the block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to before our first NonArg instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">llvm::make&#95;range</a>(InsertPt, EntryMBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a15296a1aa48a333f25583e31fd8f2a40">WebAssembly::isArgument</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EntryMBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3435a2381e60e842e915f85c931b7dde">insert</a>(InsertPt, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.removeFromParent());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
